搣字的基本解释

搣
miè
用手拔。
摩。

搣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miè］
［《廣韻》亡列切，入薛，明。］
(1)拔。
(2)按摩。
(3)拇指与别指指肚相捻，发出清脆声音的动作。也叫打榧子。

搣字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搣； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页447第16
【唐韻】亡列切【集韻】莫列切【正韻】彌列切，?音滅。【說文】批也。【廣韻】手拔也。又摩也，捽也。　又翾劣切，音烕。【急就篇】沐浴揃搣寡合同。【師古註】揃搣，謂鬄拔眉髮也，蓋去其不齊整者。

搣字的源字形

搣字的起名意思

暂无。

miè

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［miè］
["Guangyun" dead row cut, enter Xue, Ming. ]
(1) Pull out.
(2) Massage.
(3) The action of twisting the thumb and the other finger to make a crisp sound. Also called playing torreya.

[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　搣; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 447 16
[Tang Yun] Dead Line Cut [Ji Yun] Mo Lie Cut [Zheng Rhyme] Mile Cut, the sound is off. 【Said the text】Pan Ye. [Guang Yun] Hand drawn. Mo also, slap too.　It's cut again and badly, and the sound is stubborn. [Emergency articles] Take a shower and miss the contract. [Shi Gu's Note] 揃搣, said that the hair and eyebrows are plucked, to cover up the irregular ones.
